segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little disgusted by how careless the woman is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s got water spilling everywhere and doesn’t even notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if someone slips and falls – that would be such a mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are planning this secret cookie mission like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to look up and see what’s really going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s polishing that plate, she’s so lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a recipe for disaster, and yet, there’s something almost comical about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
